About GreenHostBox

GreenHostBox was established in May 27, 2013 in looking to provide customers with high quality hosting and support. We understand that anything from a small personal blog to a mission-critical business site needs to be accessible and fast 24 hours a day. We continue to expand and grow bigger everyday which is the key of our success. At GreenHostBox, we keep everything at a very affordable price while maintaining our hosting qualities and expectations high. All of our servers uses RAID to maintain your important data with high redundancy and premium networks for quick loading speeds. No one should pay hefty unnecessary prices for services which is one of the many reasons why our customers choose us. We keep a high uptime promise at 99.9% and if it goes below that, you will get compensated. If you aren't completely satisfied with our hosting we offer a thirty days money back guarantee regardless of reason! You can now try our services worry free!

Server's Specification (Minimum)

  • Intel Xeon CPUs
  • SATA Drives in RAID-10
  • 1Gbps Port
  • Located in Piscataway, New Jersey
  • Datacenter: Dupont Fabros

♥ Why Our Customers Love Us ♥

  • ★ Instant Setup - The second after you order and pay, our billing system automatically creates your account and emails you your hosting account information. No need to wait hours or even days for your account to be created! All plan upgrades and downgrades are also done instantly without any downtime!
  • ★ Quality Transparent Support - Here at GreenHostBox, we like to keep our customers informed about an issue or update. We always do our best to try to help our customers in need. We never lie to our customers and are always honest, no matter the situation.
  • ★ Quality Hosting - We utilize the latest hardware which allows our servers to always be high in performance. You will always receive the high service that you paid for. We hate lagging behind in competition of hosting industries which is why we always strive to offer services to our customers that meets their needs and expectations.
  • ★ High Security - Security is our number one priority which is why we have CloudLinux installed on our cPanel servers and all of our servers severely hardened. Additionally, Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) are installed and used in our billing system so your sensitive information are encrypted between our servers and your browser. Our high security allows customers to trust us.
  • ★ High Performance - Due to our enterprise hardware and technology, we are able to provide our customers with quick performance speeds so the customer's ever-growing website doesn't fall behind. The #1 reason why visitors leave websites is due to the sluggishness of the website's loading speed.
  • ★ Servers Never Overloaded - We never overload our server to the point where it affects the performance that we promise. We always like to leave plenty of room and whenever a server starts filling up, we deploy a new server so our customers doesn't need to be worried!
  • ★ Servers Monitored 24/7/365 - If there was a case that one of our servers were to be down or sluggish, we would receive immediate notifications so we can investigate and troubleshoot the problem as quickly as possible so your website has minimal disruptions.
  • ★ Price Lock - We are not interested in scamming or deceiving our customers in any way for more money and we will never be. The price of the service you first signed up with will always be what you pay guaranteed.
  • ★ Thirty Days Money Back Guarantee - If you are dissatisfied with our service or even because the sky is blue, we will refund your money if your service was ordered within thirty days. Now with our money back policy, you can try out our services with risk free!
